import React from 'react'; import statics from '../../util/statics.js' const About = () => { return (
UI/UX Frontend Backend

Hi, I'm John O'Brien

I build beautiful, responsive web applications. Let's build something together.

My story

I'm a self-taught web developer that started their programming journey at the beginning of 2020. I was hooked from the first moment I understood the depth of possibility and felt the satisfaction of growth and progress. My goal is to master the development process, delivering beautiful, enjoyable UX/UI while also engineering fast, efficient and powerful solutions on the backend. I'm a lifelong problem solver who gets immense satisfaction breaking down complex problems into manageable pieces.

) } export default About;
